General.Name: ROK Resources Inc
General.Description: ROK Resources Inc. operates as independent oil and gas company in Canada. It primarily engages in production, exploration, and development of oil and natural gas in Southeast Saskatchewan. The company is headquartered in Regina, Canada.
General.Address: 1911 Broad Street, Regina, SK, Canada, S4P 1Y1
